_view - Variable in class cs35013s.view.Window
the view contained in this window
_viewCenter - Variable in class cs35013s.view.A_Descriptor
the center of the view in pixels
_viewSize - Variable in class cs35013s.view.A_Descriptor
the size in pixels of the view on which the world is rendered, which is always close to square
_window - Variable in class cs35013s.view.A_View
the window owning this view
_windows - Variable in class cs35013s.view.WindowManager
the windows being managed
